verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called מֹשֶׁה֮ <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> all Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> unto them Hear יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> O Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֻקִּ֣ים <WH2706> the statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> and judgments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I דֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> which I speak בְּאָזְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH241> in your ears הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> this day וּלְמַדְתֶּ֣ם <WH3925> that ye may learn אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH8104> them and keep לַעֲשֹׂתָֽם׃ <WH6213> and do
יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God כָּרַ֥ת <WH3772> made עִמָּ֛נוּ <WH5973> with בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> a covenant בְּחֹרֵֽב׃ <WH2722> with us in Horeb

לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶת־ <WH854> with אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH1> with our fathers כָּרַ֥ת <WH3772> made יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> not this covenant הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִתָּ֗נוּ <WH854> with אֲנַ֨חְנוּ <WH587> but with us אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> [even] us who [are] all of us פֹ֛ה <WH6311> here הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> this day כֻּלָּ֥נוּ <WH3605> us all חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> here alive

פָּנִ֣ים ׀ <WH6440> with you face בְּפָנִ֗ים <WH6440> to face דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> talked יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> The LORD עִמָּכֶ֛ם <WH5973> at בָּהָ֖ר <WH2022> in the mount מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of the fire

אָ֠נֹכִי <WH595> I עֹמֵ֨ד <WH5975> (I stood בֵּין־ <WH996> between יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> between the LORD וּבֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <WH996> between בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> and you at that time הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> he לְהַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> to shew לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> you the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יְרֵאתֶם֙ <WH3372> for ye were afraid מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> by reason הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> of the fire וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not עֲלִיתֶ֥ם <WH5927> and went not up בָּהָ֖ר <WH2022> the mountain לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> said ס

אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who הוֹצֵאתִ֛יךָ <WH3318> which brought thee out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מִבֵּ֣י֥ת <WH1004> from the house עֲבָדִֽ֑ים׃ <WH5650> of bondage
לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יִהְיֶ֥ה־ <WH1961> shall have לְךָ֛֩ אֱלֹהִ֥֨ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֖֜ים <WH312> Thou shalt have none other עַל־ <WH5921> and פָּנָֽ֗יַ׃ <WH6440> before

לֹֽ֣א־ <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה־ <WH6213> Thou shalt not make לְךָ֥֣ פֶ֣֙סֶל֙ ׀ <WH6459> thee [any] graven image כָּל־ <WH3605> any תְּמוּנָ֔֡ה <WH8544> [or] any likeness אֲשֶׁ֤֣ר <WH834> what בַּשָּׁמַ֣֙יִם֙ ׀ <WH8064> [of any thing] that [is] in heaven מִמַּ֔֡עַל <WH4605> above וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר֩ <WH834> what בָּאָ֖֨רֶץ <WH776> or that [is] in the earth מִתָּ֑֜חַת <WH8478> under וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what בַּמַּ֖֣יִם ׀ <WH4325> beneath or that [is] in the waters מִתַּ֥֣חַת <WH8478> under לָאָֽ֗רֶץ׃ <WH776> beneath the earth

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥֣ה <WH7812> Thou shalt not bow down לָהֶ֖ם֮ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or תָעָבְדֵ֑ם֒ <WH5647> thyself unto them nor serve כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> I יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> them for I the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God אֵ֣ל <WH410> God קַנָּ֔א <WH7067> [am] a jealous פֹּ֠קֵד <WH6485> visiting עֲוֹ֨ן <WH5771> the iniquity אָב֧וֹת <WH1> of the fathers עַל־ <WH5921> on בָּנִ֛ים <WH1121> upon the children וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on שִׁלֵּשִׁ֥ים <WH8029> unto the third וְעַל־ <WH5921> and רִבֵּעִ֖ים <WH7256> and fourth לְשֹׂנְאָֽ֑י׃ <WH8130> [generation] of them that hate

וְעֹ֤֥שֶׂה <WH6213> And shewing חֶ֖֙סֶד֙ <WH2617> mercy לַֽאֲלָפִ֑֔ים <WH505> unto thousands לְאֹהֲבַ֖י <WH157> of them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> me and keep [מִצְוֹתֹו כ] (מִצְוֹתָֽי׃ <WH4687> commanded ק) ס

לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִשָּׂ֛א <WH5375> Thou shalt not take אֶת־ <WH853> שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לַשָּׁ֑וְא <WH7723> in vain כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> will not יְנַקֶּה֙ <WH5352> will not hold [him] guiltless יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> that taketh אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name לַשָּֽׁוְא׃ <WH7723> in vain ס

שָׁמ֣֛וֹר <WH8104> Keep אֶת־ <WH853> י֥וֹם֩ <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֖֨ת <WH7676> the sabbath לְקַדְּשׁ֑֜וֹ <WH6942> to sanctify כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after צִוְּךָ֖֣ ׀ <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֥֣ה <WH3068> it as the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God
שֵׁ֤֣שֶׁת <WH8337> Six יָמִ֣ים֙ <WH3117> days תַּֽעֲבֹ֔ד֮ <WH5647> thou shalt labour וְעָשִׂ֖֣יתָ <WH6213> and do כָּֿל־ <WH3605> all מְלַאכְתֶּֽךָ֒׃ <WH4399> all thy work

וְי֙וֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜֔י <WH7637> But the seventh שַׁבָּ֖֣ת ׀ <WH7676> [is] the sabbath לַיהוָ֖֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑֗יךָ <WH430> thy God לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> [in it] thou shalt not do כָל־ <WH3605> any מְלָאכָ֡ה <WH4399> any work אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you וּבִנְךָֽ־ <WH1121> thou nor thy son וּבִתֶּ֣ךָ <WH1323> nor thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָֽ־ <WH5650> nor thy manservant וַ֠אֲמָתֶךָ <WH519> nor thy maidservant וְשׁוֹרְךָ֨ <WH7794> nor thine ox וַחֲמֹֽרְךָ֜ <WH2543> nor thine ass וְכָל־ <WH3605> any בְּהֶמְתֶּ֗ךָ <WH929> nor any of thy cattle וְגֵֽרְךָ֙ <WH1616> nor thy stranger אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> that [is] within thy gates לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> so יָנ֛וּחַ <WH5117> may rest עַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> that thy manservant וַאֲמָתְךָ֖ <WH519> and thy maidservant כָּמֽ֑וֹךָ׃ <WH3644> You

וְזָכַרְתָּ֞֗ <WH2142> And remember כִּ֣י־ <WH3588> for עֶ֤֥בֶד <WH5650> that thou wast a servant הָיִ֣֙יתָ֙ ׀ <WH1961> become בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔֗יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיֹּצִ֨אֲךָ֜֩ <WH3318> brought יְהוָ֤֨ה <WH3068> and [that] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֤֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God מִשָּׁ֔ם֙ <WH8033> of there בְּיָ֤֥ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָ֖ה֙ <WH2389> thee out thence through a mighty וּבִזְרֹ֣עַ <WH2220> arm נְטוּיָ֑֔ה <WH5186> and by a stretched out עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that צִוְּךָ֙ <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> therefore the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> thee to keep אֶת־ <WH853> י֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> the sabbath ס

כַּבֵּ֤ד <WH3513> Honour אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> thy father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִמֶּ֔ךָ <WH517> and thy mother כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God לְמַ֣עַן ׀ <WH4616> because of יַאֲרִיכֻ֣ן <WH748> may be prolonged יָמֶ֗יךָ <WH3117> thee that thy days וּלְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> and that it יִ֣יטַב <WH3190> and that it may go well לָ֔ךְ עַ֚ל <WH5921> with הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> with thee in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָֽךְ׃ ס
לֹ֥֖א <WH3808> shall not תִּֿרְצָֽח׃ <WH7523> Thou shalt not kill ס
וְלֹ֖֣א <WH3808> shall not תִּֿנְאָֽ֑ף׃ <WH5003> Neither shalt thou commit adultery ס
וְלֹ֖֣א <WH3808> shall not תִּֿגְנֹֽ֔ב׃ <WH1589> Neither shalt thou steal ס
וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תַעֲנֶ֥ה <WH6030> Neither shalt thou bear בְרֵֽעֲךָ֖ <WH7453> against thy neighbour עֵ֥ד <WH5707> witness שָֽׁוְא׃ <WH7723> false. ס

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַחְמֹ֖ד <WH2530> Neither shalt thou desire אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife רֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> thy neighbour's ס וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> shall not תִתְאַוֶּ֜ה <WH183> neither shalt thou covet בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house רֵעֶ֗ךָ <WH7453> thy neighbour's שָׂדֵ֜הוּ <WH7704> his field וְעַבְדּ֤וֹ <WH5650> or his manservant וַאֲמָתוֹ֙ <WH519> or his maidservant שׁוֹר֣וֹ <WH7794> his ox וַחֲמֹר֔וֹ <WH2543> or his ass וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> your לְרֵעֶֽךָ׃ <WH7453> or any [thing] that [is] thy neighbour's ס

אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> These words הָאֵ֡לֶּה <WH428> These דִּבֶּר֩ <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all קְהַלְכֶ֜ם <WH6951> unto all your assembly בָּהָ֗ר <WH2022> in the mount מִתּ֤וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> of the fire הֶֽעָנָ֣ן <WH6051> of the cloud וְהָֽעֲרָפֶ֔ל <WH6205> and of the thick darkness ק֥וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> with a great וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no יָסָ֑ף <WH3254> and he added no more וַֽיִּכְתְּבֵ֗ם <WH3789> And he wrote עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> them in two לֻחֹ֣ת <WH3871> tables אֲבָנִ֔ים <WH68> of stone וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖ם <WH5414> and delivered אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּשָׁמְעֲכֶ֤ם <WH8085> And it came to pass when ye heard אֶת־ <WH853> הַקּוֹל֙ <WH6963> the voice מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הַחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> of the darkness וְהָהָ֖ר <WH2022> (for the mountain בֹּעֵ֣ר <WH1197> did burn בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> fire וַתִּקְרְב֣וּן <WH7126> came אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me כָּל־ <WH3605> all רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> unto me [even] all the heads שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֖ם <WH7626> of your tribes וְזִקְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH2205> and your elders

וַתֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> And ye said הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold הֶרְאָ֜נוּ <WH7200> hath shewed יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Behold the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> our God אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבֹד֣וֹ <WH3519> us his glory וְאֶת־ <WH853> גָּדְל֔וֹ <WH1433> and his greatness וְאֶת־ <WH853> קֹל֥וֹ <WH6963> his voice שָׁמַ֖עְנוּ <WH8085> and we have heard מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הָאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> of the fire הַיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> we רָאִ֔ינוּ <WH7200> we have seen כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> doth talk אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> that God אֶת־ <WH854> with הָֽאָדָ֖ם <WH120> with man וָחָֽי׃ <WH2425> and he liveth

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> why נָמ֔וּת <WH4191> Now therefore why should we die כִּ֣י <WH3588> for תֹֽאכְלֵ֔נוּ <WH398> will consume הָאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> fire הַגְּדֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> ? for this great הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> us אִם־ <WH518> if יֹסְפִ֣ים ׀ <WH3254> any more אֲנַ֗חְנוּ <WH587> we לִ֠שְׁמֹעַ <WH8085> us if we hear אֶת־ <WH853> ק֨וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <WH430> our God ע֖וֹד <WH5750> any וָמָֽתְנוּ׃ <WH4191> then we shall die

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For מִ֣י <WH4310> who כָל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂ֡ר <WH1320> For who [is there of] all flesh אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> that hath heard קוֹל֩ <WH6963> the voice אֱלֹהִ֨ים <WH430> God חַיִּ֜ים <WH2416> of the living מְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> speaking מִתּוֹךְ־ <WH8432> out of the midst הָאֵ֛שׁ <WH784> of the fire כָּמֹ֖נוּ <WH3644> as וַיֶּֽחִי׃ <WH2421> as we [have] and lived

קְרַ֤ב <WH7126> Go thou near אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וּֽשֲׁמָ֔ע <WH8085> and hear אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after יֹאמַ֖ר <WH559> shall say יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God וְאַ֣תְּ ׀ <WH859> you תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> and speak אֵלֵ֗ינוּ <WH413> about אֵת֩ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יְדַבֵּ֜ר <WH1696> shall speak יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> thou unto us all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <WH430> our God אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you וְשָׁמַ֥עְנוּ <WH8085> unto thee and we will hear וְעָשִֽׂינוּ׃ <WH6213> [it] and do

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> heard יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice דִּבְרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1697> of your words בְּדַבֶּרְכֶ֖ם <WH1696> when ye spake אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> unto me and the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me שָׁ֠מַעְתִּי <WH8085> unto me I have heard אֶת־ <WH853> ק֨וֹל <WH6963> the voice דִּבְרֵ֜י <WH1697> of the words הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> of this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> which they have spoken אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you הֵיטִ֖יבוּ <WH3190> unto thee they have well כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH1696> said all that they have spoken

מִֽי־ <WH4310> an יִתֵּ֡ן <WH5414> in them וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> had לְבָבָ֨ם <WH3824> heart זֶ֜ה <WH2088> O that there were such לָהֶ֗ם לְיִרְאָ֥ה <WH3372> that they would fear אֹתִ֛י <WH853> וְלִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> me and keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹתַ֖י <WH4687> all my commandments כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> always לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> that it יִיטַ֥ב <WH3190> that it might be well לָהֶ֛ם וְלִבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> with them and with their children לְעֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever
לֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> Go אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> say לָהֶ֑ם שׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> again לָכֶ֖ם לְאָהֳלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH168> you into your tents

וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you פֹּה֮ <WH6311> here עֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> But as for thee stand עִמָּדִי֒ <WH5978> thou here by me וַאֲדַבְּרָ֣ה <WH1696> and I will speak אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> about אֵ֧ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמִּצְוָ֛ה <WH4687> unto thee all the commandments וְהַחֻקִּ֥ים <WH2706> and the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <WH4941> and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תְּלַמְּדֵ֑ם <WH3925> which thou shalt teach וְעָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> them that they may do בָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> [them] in the land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> which I give לָהֶ֖ם לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> them to possess

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH8104> Ye shall observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> to do כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֛ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> therefore as the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תָסֻ֖רוּ <WH5493> you ye shall not turn aside יָמִ֥ין <WH3225> to the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאל׃ <WH8040> or to the left

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> in all the ways אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֜ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֛ם <WH430> your God אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> תֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> shall walk לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> that תִּֽחְיוּן֙ <WH2421> you that ye may live וְט֣וֹב <WH2895> and [that it may be] well לָכֶ֔ם וְהַאֲרַכְתֶּ֣ם <WH748> with you and [that] ye may prolong יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> [your] days בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תִּֽירָשֽׁוּן׃ <WH3423> which ye shall possess
